biotools.summary: Cell State Transition Expression Atlas. Organize, analyze and visualize the time-course gene expression data during cell differentiation, cellular reprogramming and trans-differentiation in human and mouse. In particular, it defines gene signatures for uncharacterized stages during cell state transitions.

bioschemas.name: CSTEA
bioschemas.summary: Cell State Transition Expression Atlas. Organize, analyze and visualize the time-course gene expression data during cell differentiation, cellular reprogramming and trans-differentiation in human and mouse. In particular, it defines gene signatures for uncharacterized stages during cell state transitions.
